Metadata.title: Webiston | Free Courses and Tools for Developers
Metadata.description: A modern platform for learning programming. High-quality, free courses on React and useful tools for developers in Uzbek and English.

HomePage.title: A deep dive into the world of web technologies
HomePage.description: Webiston — free education and useful tools for modern web technologies. All the resources you need for learning and development in one place.
HomePage.reactSectionDescription: A deep dive into the fundamental concepts of React. From component logic to advanced architectural patterns—everything you need to master React professionally, available for free in Uzbek.
HomePage.toolsSectionDescription: A collection of handy online tools to make every developer's daily tasks easier.
HomePage.jsSectionDescription: The complete Uzbek translation of the classic masterpiece on JavaScript. From the foundational principles to the most advanced features—everything you need in a single guide.

Metadata.description: Webiston - In-depth knowledge and practical guides on Web Technologies, React, Next.js, JavaScript. Learn programming with us.
